name: Parallel Worlds (hyperscope)
description:
Parallel Worlds is a exploration game about balancing your environment through light & dark. 

It was created in 48 hours for the 2019 Winnipeg Game Jam.

Best played with headphones!

Controls Arrows Keys - Movement
Space - JumpHow to Play

Collect the Wanderers to fill up the bars and bring the sun and the moon closer together. Dark Wanderers can only be found in the light and Light Wanderers in the dark

CREDITS

Programming - @TheSteveIAm
Audio - @Vertigo Fox
User Interface - @jackie_markie
Concept & 3D Art - @ShaelynDesign
Concept & Effects - Chris
Producer - @hyperscope

Game Engine: Unity
